content:
Daivatthin jeevaathmajane kaikallilenti-
Janamaddhye nilppumariyaam-aamgyatthaaleelokatthe
Paalippone-paaloottunnu thalpraarththhana
Haale......... Nammodukoode

Sahadenmaare! Ningallude smaranadinatthil
Bhoosvargangallilamarunnor-divyaasthhikallude veeryatthe
Keertthikkunnu-ningade praarththhanayennennum
Haale........ Nyangallkkabhayam

Baabelileyerutheekkuzhiyil chennunnikalle
Samrakshichoru panimanyee-mrtharettheenarakattheennum
Rakshikkatte-sampaadikkanamavaroduvil
Haale......... Shaashvatha jeevan
(vi. Kurbaanayillengkil maar severiyosinte maaneesa (peju 80) vishvaasapramaanam, kukkiliyonukall muthalaayava cholli avasaanippikkanam.)
